items.title: Investors on hold for Fed Chair Powell’s speech as strong data boosts stocks globally
items.description: Buying momentum continued in Asia and European stock markets today, but all eyes are on Jerome Powell's upcoming commentary.

items.title: Meet the man Warren Buffett trusts with his $1.2 trillion empire
items.description: Greg Abel is expected to take the helm at Berkshire Hathaway as the Buffett era draws nigh.

items.title: Virginia, Washington and Georgia want judges to force dangerous drivers to install car devices that stop them from speeding
items.description: New York and California also could soon tap the GPS-based technology to help combat a recent national spike in traffic deaths.

items.title: JPMorgan Chase axes startup-VC platform Capital Connect, but remains committed to innovation economy
items.description: JPMorgan has redeployed most of Capital Connect’s 200 employees

items.title: As the mighty Permian Basin slows, Canada stands to rise in the shale oil and gas world
items.description: Kimmeridge activist investment firm eyes Canadian producers and new LNG projects.
